data: I've spent the last 5 years engineering for top companies. These include the BBC, CompareTheMarket.com and Philips. It's been a constant journey of learning, and I'm keen to share what I've learnt with the community. My primary outlet is through my blog - which had been read over 100,000 times. But I've also spoken at conferences and meetups including Fullstack London and Agile Peterborough.
